doc.field: Subseries B: Tomio Geron, Academic Program Coordinator Asian/Pacific/American Studies Program
Subseries B: Tomio Geron, Academic Program Coordinator Asian/Pacific/American Studies Program

Subseries B contains correspondence, memoranda, and reports related to the further development of the A/P/A studies academic program. This includes new course proposals, staff and faculty job descriptions, the development of a mission statement, departmental magazines, and the creation of an alumni association. These records reflect the planning involved in the ongoing development of the academic program.
